about_the_game:
Recruit and manage the team of FPS players of your dreams, create your own strategies and rise to the top of the world's elite.

Recruit and train the team of your dreams:

Recruit your favourite players from the hundreds available to create the line-up you've always dreamed of. Create their match and training schedules to keep them improving in the areas you've chosen. Are you going to train your favorite player with a sniper rifle or rather recruit one directly on the market? Why not recruit young talents and take them to the top with you?

Create your own tactics and win tournaments:

  • Create the tactics of your dreams and train your team on them to become more and more effective.
  • Master the game's money system to buy your players the most useful weapons at the right time. Force them to buy every round? Save up to buy your best player a sniper rifle? The choice is yours.
  • Choose the tactics to be used during the rounds from those you have created or from those that already exist. And why not take inspiration from your opponents' tactics?
  • Register your team for the tournaments that are most interesting to you, from the smallest local LAN to the biggest major tournaments.

Modify your game:

Easily edit game files to change player stats and appearances, teams, tournaments and more to get the career of your dreams. And why not add yourself and your friends to the game?

Manage your sponsors and finances:

Meet your sponsors' targets and deadlines to boost your finances and progress to the highest level. Be careful, though, if you don't achieve your objectives.
